navbar.title: Privacy Policy
navbar.description: This privacy policy outlines how we process your data.

section1.title: Personal Data
section1.description: We collect and process personal data to provide our services, including information such as name, email address, and user activity on our platform.

section2.title: Cookies
section2.description: Our website uses cookies for traffic analysis, content personalization, and enhanced functionality. You can adjust cookie settings in your browser.

section3.title: Data Sharing
section3.description: We share personal data only with trusted partners and service providers in accordance with applicable laws and privacy policies.

section4.title: Your Rights
section4.description: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your data. You can also withdraw your consent to data processing at any time.

section5.title: Data Security
section5.description: We protect your data using advanced security technologies, including encryption and strict access control.

section6.title: Data Retention
section6.description: Your data is retained for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.

section7.title: Contact
section7.description: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact us at: contact@meowhub.com.
